prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a unique design reminiscent of a spider and aquatic features.
Imagine a bug-type creature that can trap its enemies in bubbles while swimming through water.
Design a Pokemon that has a combination of insect and aquatic elements, perfect for wetlands.
Show me a cool Pokemon that combines aquatic abilities with spider-like agility and charm.
Generate an image of a Pokemon that looks like a water-dwelling arachnid with vibrant colors.
Make a creature that has both water and bug-type characteristics, showcasing its combat skills.
Give me a Pokemon that thrives in wetland habitats, featuring a striking blue and green color palette.
